2.5.0.name: socks
2.5.0.description: Fully featured SOCKS proxy client supporting SOCKSv4, SOCKSv4a, and SOCKSv5. Includes Bind and Associate functionality.

scripts.prepublish: npm install -g typescript && npm run build
scripts.coveralls: NODE_ENV=test nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.build: rm -rf build typings && tslint --project tsconfig.json && prettier --write ./src/**/*.ts --config .prettierrc.yaml && tsc -p .
